## assertIsMessage() function

Assert whether a given value is not only a [MessageBase](./tab-info.messagebase.md)<!-- -->, but also has a `key` property of a known message type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function assertIsMessage(message: unknown): asserts message is Message;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  message | unknown | value to test |

<b>Returns:</b>

asserts message is [Message](./tab-info.message.md)
